EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Assessors, have you been to a staff assessment yet?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Huge thanks to everyone who's been a Youth Assessor so far! You've done a brilliant job and have contributed to us being able to hire some exceptional staff for NCS this summer.
Anyone who hasn't had the chance yet (or wants to come to another one), please see below for all the dates we've got available in May. Reply to this email with the date(s) that you would like to attend, and we'll send you further details!
There are only three places for Youth Assessors per date, so allocations will be on a first-come-first-served basis.
